content:
I had reached out to Mullai to see if it would be possible for our IG to leverage the images from the eMERGE Project for our IG.. see her gracious response below. I would like to incorporate the discussion of how we might use these images (and/or update them as needed), in out IG during the WGM.

Some key images can be found at:
https://emerge-fhir-spec.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_images/hgsc-report-mapped.jpg
https://emerge-fhir-spec.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_images/lmm-report-mapped.png
https://emerge-fhir-spec.readthedocs.io/en/latest/artifacts/index.html
Main site can be found here: https://emerge-fhir-spec.readthedocs.io/en/latest/design.html#example-reports

Mullai's email:

We are happy to share the images for use in the CG IG - after checking with Ken Wiley (NHGRI Program Manager for eMERGE Phase III) and Larry Babb (author of the images). Per Larry, the original images were created with LucidChart but the ones on the ReadTheDocs website should be at full resolution and usable. Let me know if you run into any issues with using the images.

Also, I checked with the eMERGE Phase III Network Coordinating Center on using the images, they suggest citing the network website ( https://emerge-network.org/ ) and our FHIR paper. However, our FHIR paper is still in the works, would you mind citing the ACMG sequencing paper until it is ready?

Apologies if this seems rather convoluted, please do let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Mullai

I am uploading the images here... hopefully this works!
hgsc-report-mapped.jpg hgsc-report-plain.png lmm-report-layout.png lmm-report-mapped.png hgsc-report-layout.png lmm-report-plain.png schema-overview.png schema-overview-white-background.png
